Well yeah, we've come here today, it's the first time we've been here.
We've come over from Western Supermares, so just the other side of Bristol, just for a day out.
We're all into cider, so we thought we'd come over and give it a go.
We've tried a few so far that we thought were a little bit on the iffy side, but we like one or two that we've tried.
I'm more into the bottled cider, but so far so good.
We're watching all the people streaming in through the doors and it looks like it's going to be a real busy afternoon.
